channel.title: Urban Farming on Asep's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Urban Farming on Asep's Notes

item.title: My Familyâ€™s Journey to Grow Our Own Food
item.description: My wife’s dream after we married was having a garden at home. But at that moment, we were living in an apartment with a very small balcony. It’s theoritically impossible to plant anything. So, we discovered a way to plant vegetable at small space and we found it. Hydroponic was the answer. We can plant without soil but only water. The Age of Farming in The Apartment At the first time, we were growing spinach.
